name: My Unreal Engine 4 3D Platformer level + design
name_original: My Unreal Engine 4 3D Platformer level + design
description:
My submission for my Level Design module. I had to create a 3D platformer Level with Iggy And Scorch, that was child friendly and had a Super Mario 3D World inspired camera.

Features of the game:

  • Sprinting
  • Variable Jump heights
  • Double jumping
  • Triple Jumping
  • Gun power up
  • Mario coin and life system
  • Mario timer system
  • Check points
  • Special coins to collect
  • Multiple ways to complete the level
